name: material to cellsets
desc: This module takes a field's output and recreates the cell sets based on nodal data.

properties.name: Data Type
properties.desc: The Data Type selects either nodal or cell data to be used to create cell sets.

properties.name: Data Component
properties.desc: The Data from the input field that is used to set cell sets.

properties.name: Nodal Data Component
properties.desc: The Data from the input field that is used to set cell sets.

properties.name: Cell Data Component
properties.desc: The Data from the input field that is used to set cell sets.
